mil.emp3.mapengine.interfaces

Interface IEmpImageInfo


  • public interface IEmpImageInfo
    An object that holds properties of the Image object created by Mil Std Renderer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      android.graphics.Point getCenterPoint()
      Gets the center of the image
      android.graphics.Bitmap getImage()
      Gets the bitmap of the image
      android.graphics.Rect getImageBounds()
      This method gets the images's viewing area.
      java.lang.String getImageKey()
      Gets the resource id of the image as a string.
      long getImageSize()
      Gets the size of the image that was stored when Image was created.
      int getResourceId()
      Gets the resource id of the image.
      android.graphics.Rect getSymbolBounds()
      This method gets the symbol's viewing area.
      boolean isFarImageIcon()
      Returns true if the Image is created for a Far Image Icon.
      void setFarImageIcon()
      Marks this image as Far Image Icon.

    • Method Detail

      • getCenterPoint

        android.graphics.Point getCenterPoint()
        Gets the center of the image
        Returns:
        android point

      • getImage

        android.graphics.Bitmap getImage()
        Gets the bitmap of the image
        Returns:
        android bitmap

      • getImageBounds

        android.graphics.Rect getImageBounds()
        This method gets the images's viewing area.
        Returns:
        android rectangle object

      • getSymbolBounds

        android.graphics.Rect getSymbolBounds()
        This method gets the symbol's viewing area.
        Returns:
        android rectangle object

      • getImageKey

        java.lang.String getImageKey()
        Gets the resource id of the image as a string.
        Returns:
        string

      • isFarImageIcon

        boolean isFarImageIcon()
        Returns true if the Image is created for a Far Image Icon. This is related to MidDistance/FarDistance Thresholds. Far Image icons are stored in a separate cache.
        Returns:

      • setFarImageIcon

        void setFarImageIcon()
        Marks this image as Far Image Icon. This is related to MidDistance/FarDistance Thresholds. Far Image icons are stored in a separate cache.

      • getImageSize

        long getImageSize()
        Gets the size of the image that was stored when Image was created. This is used to calculate size of the cache when WeakReference BitMap is already make by the GC.
        Returns:

      • getResourceId

        int getResourceId()
        Gets the resource id of the image.
        Returns:
        integer
